nodes.text: The Office of the Auditor-General was a department of the Corporate Sector Authority led by the Auditor-General and Assistant Auditor-Generals. Dagmar Vozda and Hart-and-Parn Gorra-Fiolla were both members of the Office of the Auditor-General. The Office of the Auditor-General oversaw two offices, the Detached Duty Office, and the Corporate Security Liaison Office. The office served to observe and root out corruption and inefficiency throughout the Corporate Sector. It also coordinated intelligence from various sources,including industrial spies, informers, and paid sympathizers embedded throughout the Galactic Empire.
